headline: Deckers’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Deckers’ fourth-quarter results were met with a significant positive market reaction, as sales and earnings surpassed Wall Street’s expectations. Management attributed the quarter’s performance to strong global demand for both the HOKA and UGG brands, with balanced growth across direct-to-consumer and wholesale channels. CEO Stefano Caroti highlighted that effective inventory management and high levels of full-price selling supported margin stability, while new product launches in both brands dr
